headers.registration.description: Creating a new account on faforever.com
headers.activation.description: Give a password and activate your account
headers.steamLink.description: Validate your game license by logging in to Steam
headers.fafClientSetup.description: Guide to setup the FAF Client up to your first game

username.caption: Username
username.restrictions: Only a-z, A-Z, digits, minus and underscore are allowed. Must start with a letter. Minimum 3, maximum 16 characters
username.description: This is your login name as well as the name visible to other players. It can be changed over time.

email.caption: Email
email.description: We will send an activation email to this address. It's also used for password reset via email.

forms.ownsSteam.accepted: I own Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance on Steam.
forms.tos.accepted: I have read and agree with our Terms of Service
forms.translationHint: Only the english version is legally binding. However, the community has created unofficial translations.
forms.privacyStatement.accepted: I have read and agree with our Privacy Statement
forms.recaptcha: To protect ourselves from bots, we need you to solve this captcha. Sorry.
forms.activation.emailWarning: This step is disabled (token missing). To enable it, please click on the activation link that you received via email.
forms.activation.invalidToken: The token in this URL is invalid. Please make sure your email client did not crop parts of the link.
forms.linkToSteam: Login to Steam by clicking on the image
forms.linkToSteam.registrationRequired: You need an activated FAF account to perform this step.

registration.success.nextSteps: We send an email to {{email}}. Please click on the activation link in this email to proceed.
